contentList.content: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragon-blooded share the snowy aspect of white dragons.
While not true dragons themselves, draconic blood runs through the dragon-blooded. Their hardened scales give them a preternatural toughness.
Draconic scales cover your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is 13.
Tell Ahzidol if you see this. Test Description
Tell Ahzidol if you see this. Test Display
Your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> maximum increases by 1, and increases by 1 again every time you gain a level.
